phrs.translation: 地下酒吧, 易通话, 易话通
昆明说吧, 地下酒吧

sentences.sentence: There is the "speakeasy": the head is held high, in a self-confident way, chatting away.
sentences.translation: “轻声说话”就是：头高高抬起，以一种自信的方式聊天。

sentences.sentence: He thinks how Shrike will ridicule him at the speakeasy, telling him to give his readers stones.
sentences.translation: “他认为，如何伯劳鸟会嘲笑他在通话，告诉他让他的读者：”石头。

sentences.sentence: A speakeasy. What could be more timely? A place to escape the modern world And violate its rules. Legality of course.
sentences.translation: 一个地下酒吧。，还有什么能比这更应时？一个逃避摩登世界，并能亵渎其规则的地方，当然是合法的。
